protected function inheritDesc(DOMNode $source,
DOMNode $desc)
Create a form description by inheriting another description.
If two forms are structurally very similar (common for create and edit forms), a form definition can be inherited from a previously declared form definition.
Just as with form descriptions, templates can be inherited from other forms.
